TopicTitle: A Picture Is Worth A Thousand Words

Articles.Content:
![IhXZAaj.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IhXZAaj.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T18:11:50Z" title="05/22/2015 06:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by DarkGravity**
Please tell me you succeeded in that unlike me (mine had science from gilly)
Haha, I really start to panic when I realize that my probe with good pack of science data from the deep space is going to land on a mountain.
Been there. Done that. Lost the data. :/
Yea... If there's one thing you absolutely cannot land on in KSP it's the side of a mountain. Gravity is a cruel, cruel mistress.
It's a shame the Klaw doesn't work on planetary surfaces - I really really want it for Gilly landing gear, and it would be fantastic for mountain landings.
No sympathy here, you somehow managed to miss an ocean ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
My first return trip from orbit ended that way. So sad. I could have been blinded by science but alas, no.

> 
> No sympathy here, you somehow managed to miss an ocean ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

While trying to get highland/mountain science. Tough crowd!

Yes, yes it is. And all of those words are censored here.

![KvpHZNOh.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KvpHZNOh.jpg)
